==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|てん|ふ|k2=ぷ|ら}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|てんぷら|テンプラ}}

# {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|sort=てんぷら|天麩羅}}: [[tempura]]: a Japanese dish made from seafood, chicken, or vegetables dipped in [[batter]] and [[deep-fried]]

====Usage notes====
This spelling swaps out the {{m|ja|麩}} character meaning {{m|en|wheat}} {{m|en|gluten}} in reference to the [[batter]] used in making tempura, for the more-common character {{m|ja|婦}} of the same reading, but meaning {{m|en|wife}}.

[[zh:天婦羅]]
